description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Binary Board System (BBS) 0.2.5 and earlier allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) inreplyto, (2) article, and (3) board parameters to reply.pl, (4) branch, (5) board, and (6) stats.pl parameters to (b) stats.pl, and (7) board parameter to (c) toc.pl.
